title: Top Floor Westwood Bachelor Penthouse Close To Everything w/ Parking

posting_body: Modern Top Floor Bachelor Penthouse Apartment
This top floor bachelor penthouse offers the following amenities:
Modern Bachelor apartment in Westwood, located within walking distance of everything in Westwood Village, just south of Wilshire and one block west of Westwood Boulevard, exactly where you want.
This apartment features include kitchenette, central air, central heat, apartment will be ready for move-in May 29th.
Community features include covered parking, an elevator, a garage, a fitness center, a laundry facility, rooftop spa, and a swimming pool.

Our impressive selection of beautifully designed floor plans offer residents the perfect blend of modern architectural design, high-end appointments and charming interiors that will impress those with even the most refined tastes.
